title: Implementation of Towns East of Colombo District Water Supply Project Package 1 and Bentota Water Supply Project
decision_details:
- Cabinet approval has already been granted for the implementation of 34 Water Supply Projects at a cost of Rs. 10.095 billion with financial assistance from Local Banks. The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity of the Minister of Finance and Planning, to authorize the Water Supply and Drainage Board, to proceed with the activities relating to the loan arrangements for the implementation of the following Water Supply Projects, was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	Towns East of Colombo District Water Supply Project -  Package 1; and

		*	Bentota Water Supply Project.
